articles.description: Follow live BBC radio commentary, text updates and the latest score and match stats as Liverpool take on Manchester United in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Liverpool vs Manchester United - radio commentary, live text updates & scores

articles.description: Follow BBC radio and live text commentaries, score updates and match stats as Fulham take on Ipswich Town in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Fulham vs Ipswich Town - radio commentary, live text updates, latest score & match stats

articles.description: Real Madrid boss Carlo Ancelotti says it is "difficult" being Vinicius Jr after the winger was sent off during his side's win against Valencia in La Liga, and hopes the Brazilian will not be banned.
articles.title: Vinicius Jr: Carlo Ancelotti defends Real Madrid winger after sending off against Valencia

articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio Bristol commentary of Northampton v Bath Rugby in the Premiership.
articles.title: Premiership LIVE: Northampton v Bath Rugby - Score & radio commentary

articles.description: Australia's series against India lived up to the weighty expectations, says home captain Pat Cummins after his side won 3-1 to regain the Border-Gavaskar Trophy.
articles.title: Australia v India: Pat Cummins says series deserved the hype

articles.description: Pakistan fight back on day three of the second Test in Cape Town after being forced to follow on by South Africa
articles.title: South Africa v Pakistan: Visitors fight back after Shan Masood century

articles.description: Lamar Jackson stars as the Baltimore Ravens clinch the AFC North title by beating the Cleveland Browns.
articles.title: Lamar Jackson stars as Baltimore Ravens clinch AFC North crown

articles.description: Watch or listen to Open All Mics, listen to commentary from Celtic Park, and follow live text coverage of five Scottish Premiership matches.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Leaders Celtic among 10 teams in action - radio & text: BBC Sport

articles.description: Coco Gauff and Taylor Fritz clinch victory for the United States over Poland in the United Cup final in Sydney.
articles.title: United Cup: Coco Gauff and Taylor Fritz guide US to title

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta is left bemoaning a penalty decision he calls "bizarre" as his side's Premier League title challenge suffers a setback at Brighton.
articles.title: Arsenal: Mikel Arteta has 'never seen' penalty like Brighton's after Joao Pedro and William Saliba incident
